page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: In the villages of{Sheepy Magna}and{ {Sheepy Parva} there are 254 dwellings including the rectory, shop, and public house.Of these 60 are old properties,some being built over 100 years ago.The majority of the houses were built within the last 40 years. Local Authority owned houses total 40, and over 70% of the houses are owner occupied,and there are a small number of privately rented flats. Since 1950 twenty two sub standard houses have been demolished and a further seven are currently due for demolition. In the village of{Sibson}there are 61 dwellings including a public house, hotel and a shop. Of the 61 properties 8 are rented and the remainder 53 are owner occupied. House{prices}in the area,a 3 bedroomed detached house costs Â£28,000 - Â£35,000
